019408f7-772f-70ee-9a69-2d8289644a12.name: badge
019408f7-772f-70ee-9a69-2d8289644a12.description: This is your DistrictCon badge. It gets you access to all the great content, villages, interactions, and social activities at DistrictCon Zero! On the back, you see your handle and attendee code: {{handle}}:{{code}}

use.value: You flash your badge to the people around you. They seem mildly impressed.

01942807-cdf2-74d7-8ad2-aa3c271ddee5.name: venue map
01942807-cdf2-74d7-8ad2-aa3c271ddee5.description: A map of the DistrictCon venue within the *Yours Truly Hotel*. On the ground level is the lobby and registration desk, as well as the *Mercy Me* bar and restaurant. Downstairs is the *conference center* where the *main stage*, *policy room*, and *village of villages* is located. There are also restrooms down there and the staff room.

01944d5d-2035-708c-b913-f7be18c0cb7a.name: staff usb drive
01944d5d-2035-708c-b913-f7be18c0cb7a.description: There's no label, but you never know, there could be something interesting on it. You could try to *use* it.

019456e1-5ff7-7425-8ebc-062a462fe6db.name: DC Metro Map
019456e1-5ff7-7425-8ebc-062a462fe6db.description: A guide to all of the metro stations in the Washington, DC area. You can *use* this map to read it.

01945c7c-e588-76de-8fb5-65e57f5b30ee.name: Som records hint
alternates: som records back room password hint
01945c7c-e588-76de-8fb5-65e57f5b30ee.description:
jimmy-T blind-messaged you saying "Hey new friend, have you made it over to Som records yet? They have the ultimate disco vinyl collection, biggest you've ever seen, some of it basically brand new! Always so much fun."
Then they gave you a hint to password for the back room at Som Records: 17 8 2 29 30 10 16 6 32 22 11

01945c61-c10c-7788-b7e7-da82b5270751.name: DisCo soundtrack
01945c61-c10c-7788-b7e7-da82b5270751.description: A vinyl record of the DistrictCon soundtrack.

019484b4-6223-75e1-8c19-91ce155f4514.name: application log file
019484b4-6223-75e1-8c19-91ce155f4514.description: Winnona asked you to look over this log file. You'll need to *use* it get the data

019484b6-9be4-705e-bc49-a67260a268f4.name: leetBeats number
019484b6-9be4-705e-bc49-a67260a268f4.description: You got leetBeats' mobile number... just in case you need their services.

use.value: They didn't pick up. Maybe that was a burner.

01948551-c92b-7324-b951-14b6d5d1fced.name: jakerella's challenge coin
01948551-c92b-7324-b951-14b6d5d1fced.description: A over-sized challenge coin with a picture of a stuffed tiger on one side and the DistrictCon logo on the other. Around the outside of the tiger-side it says 'So long, and thanks for all the fish.'

0185e0d6-c1eb-737e-8546-4eeb34ae2e93.name: Halvar's memory-safe sticker
0185e0d6-c1eb-737e-8546-4eeb34ae2e93.description: You turn the item over a couple of times, yep, it's a sticker.

use.value: You peel off the backing of the sticker and slap it on your laptop. 'That looks reeeeaaal niiiice,' you say loudly to yourself. Other people look at you strangely, but you don't care.

0171b8b7-6eb3-7688-8cc6-e9345e870135.name: DisCo Web Code
0171b8b7-6eb3-7688-8cc6-e9345e870135.description: You found the DisCo game code! Well, you found the easy part, anyway.

01743c40-5e69-7c06-ad72-a5d168075279.name: Level 1 Social Network Coin
01743c40-5e69-7c06-ad72-a5d168075279.description: A small, bronze coin with a spider web-looking graphic on one side and the words 'Socially Inclined' on the other.

0183fd5b-1009-7086-8c35-f1495d067b3d.name: Level 2 Social Network Coin
0183fd5b-1009-7086-8c35-f1495d067b3d.description: A moderately-sized, silver coin with a neural net graphic on one side and the words 'Social Butterfly' on the other.

018966db-fde3-70b4-9f0a-077394462fba.name: Level 3 Social Network Coin
018966db-fde3-70b4-9f0a-077394462fba.description: A large, gold coin with a colorful enamel inlayed graphic on one side depicting the interconnectivity of society. On the reverse is the full color DisctrictCon logo and around the edge are the words 'DistrictCon Social Ambassador'.
